short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block all YouTube videos except white-listed channels to protect your children

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Blocker allows you to block all YouTube videos except white-listed channels. You can specify these channels by adding them in a password protected list.

YouTube Blocker allows you to set maximum daily usage time of YouTube for weekends and weekdays.
